mapper.insert: insert into efence (id, code, name, type, coordinates, run_status, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coordinates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update efence set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coordinates = #{coordinates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, run_status = #{runStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, type, coordinates, run_status, create_time, remark from efence
